::Halucigen::
Halucigen continued flying for a while until coming upon a base 
somewhere north of the CF around present day Syria. He swooped down 
to investigate far ahead of the base. He landed and transformed to 
his scorpion mode and the now tiny bot began his way for the base 
starting his sensor jammers.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Khonkolor::
> 
> "Cya Halucigen" screamed Khonkolor "If you like join us just come 
> back and I'll invite you a glass of energon"
> 
>

> > Goodbye and work on you aim."

flew
